languages.text: [Взять вокс] "Вигдис, срочно, выясни у нашего корабельного хормейстера, не замечен ли мастер Прас с Даргонуса в компрометирующем поведении".
[Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."
languages.original_text: [Взять вокс] "Вигдис, срочно, выясни у нашего корабельного хормейстера, не замечен ли мастер Прас с Даргонуса в компрометирующем поведении".

traits.locale_text: [Take the vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any implicating behaviour."
[Take the vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any implicating behaviour."
[Take the vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."
"What can you tell me about the Astropathic Choir?"
[Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."
[Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."
[Take the vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

languages.text: [Dein Vox einschalten] "Vigdis, schnell, fragt den Chormeister unseres Schiffs, ob Meister Pras von Dargonus belastende Verhaltensweisen an den Tag gelegt hat."
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

traits.locale_text: [Dein Vox einschalten] "Vigdis, schnell, fragt den Chormeister unseres Schiffs, ob Meister Pras von Dargonus belastende Verhaltensweisen an den Tag gelegt hat."

languages.text: [Allumer votre vox] « Vigdis, demandez à notre maître de chœur si maître Pras de Dargonus s'est déjà livré à des activités compromettantes. C'est urgent. »
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

traits.locale_text: [Allumer votre vox] « Vigdis, demandez à notre maître de chœur si maître Pras de Dargonus s'est déjà livré à des activités compromettantes. C'est urgent. »
[Prendre le vox] « Vigdis, demandez à notre maître de chœur si maître Pras de Dargonus s'est déjà livré à des activités compromettantes. C'est urgent. »

languages.text: [打开通讯器]“维格迪斯，快点。问问船上的唱诗大师，弄清达戈努斯的普拉斯大师有没有任何不端行为。”
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

traits.locale_text: [拿起音阵装置]“维格迪斯，快点。问问船上的唱诗大师，弄清达戈努斯的普拉斯大师有没有任何不端行为。”
[拿起音阵装置]“维格迪斯，快点。问问船上的唱诗大师，弄清达戈努斯的普拉斯大师有没有任何不端行为。”

languages.text: [Encender el voco] «Vigdis, pregunte al Maestro del Coro de la nave si el maestro Pras de Dargonus ha participado en alguna actividad polémica».
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

traits.locale_text: [Encender el voco] «Vigdis, pregunte al Maestro del Coro de la nave si el maestro Pras de Dargonus ha participado en alguna actividad polémica».

languages.text: [ヴォックスをオンにする]「ヴィグディス、急げ、ダルゴナスのマスター、プラスが危険な行為に及んだことがあるかどうか、我が船のクワイアーマスターに尋ねてくれ」
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."

traits.locale_text: [ヴォックスを取る]「ヴィグディス、急げ、ダルゴナスのマスター、プラスが危険な行為に及んだことがあるかどうか、我が船のクワイアーマスターに尋ねてくれ」
[ヴォックスを取る]「ヴィグディス、急げ、ダルゴナスのマスター、プラスが危険な行為に及んだことがあるかどうか、我が船のクワイアーマスターに尋ねてくれ」

languages.text: [Voksunu aç] "Vigdis, derhâl gemimizin Koro Şefi'ne Dargonuslu Üstat Pras'ın herhangi bir şaibeli davranışının olup olmadığını sor."
languages.original_text: [Switch on your vox] "Vigdis, quick, ask our ship's Choirmaster whether Master Pras of Dargonus has been known to engage in any compromising behaviour."
